data.text:
@TheKoreaHerald Thanks for taking the lead.
These information are usually developed by government a few weeks in the pandemic. However we are now into 3rd yr and poor managed hospitals will affect more Koreans and foreigners in this country. ❤️‍🩹

@TheKoreaHerald Free app Bost makes it safe and easy to connect with people nearby avoiding close contact that spreads new variant. Download for free at Apple https://t.co/uChWyocMBe & Google https://t.co/Nvi0yiL0UN https://t.co/T2yPzslWQZ
Here are the points of contact for medical emergencies, translation and other support. https://t.co/eEidRxBKRx
